channel.title: Making NPC's fight eachother?
channel.description: Hi, does anybody know how to make NPC's fight eachother like in the gnome war on real rs? I know I saw a tut for it once, but never read it or used it, and now I can't find it. So if you know how, or know the link to the tut, please post it here, thanks! :)

item.title: Making NPC's fight eachother?
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

Hi, does anybody know how to make NPC’s fight eachother like in the gnome war on real rs?
I know I saw a tut for it once, but never read it or used it, and now I can’t find it.
So if you know how, or know the link to the tut, please post it here, thanks!
